mapper.select:
select count(*) from service_order
where service_name like concat('%',#{service_name},'%')
mapper.sql: ID, SERVICE_NO, ORDER_ID, E_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_INFO, UNIT_PRICE, BUY_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SERVICE_REQUEST, PROVIDER_ID, UNIT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from service_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into service_order (ID, SERVICE_NO, ORDER_ID, E_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERVICE_NAME, SERVICE_INFO, UNIT_PRICE, BUY_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SERVICE_REQUEST, PROVIDER_ID, UNIT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{serviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update service_order
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NO = #{record.serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_ID = #{record.eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ID = #{record.serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_INFO = #{record.serviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{record.unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUY_NUM = #{record.buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{record.totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SERVICE_REQUEST = #{record.serviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_ID = #{record.providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update service_order set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NO = #{record.serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E_ID = #{record.eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ID = #{record.serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{record.serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_INFO = #{record.serviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{record.unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUY_NUM = #{record.buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{record.totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, SERVICE_REQUEST = #{record.serviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_ID = #{record.providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{record.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update service_order
SERVICE_NO = #{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E_ID = #{eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_INFO = #{serviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BUY_NUM = #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
SERVICE_REQUEST = #{serviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update service_order set SERVICE_NO = #{serviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E_ID = #{eId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ID = #{serviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_NAME = #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_INFO = #{serviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUY_NUM = #{buyNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, SERVICE_REQUEST = #{serviceRequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
